mapper.select: select o.*,p.type_name,e1.employee_name make_up_Name,e2.employee_name photo_name,e3.employee_name ps_Name,e4.employee_name choose_name, e5.employee_name floor_name from employees e1,employees e2,employees e3,employees e4,employees e5, Photo_type p, orders o where p.type_Id=o.type_Id and e5.employee_Id=o.floor and e1.employee_Id=o.make_up and e2.employee_Id=o.photo and e3.employee_Id=o.ps and e4.employee_Id=o.choose and o.order_id=${value}
select o.*,e.Employee_Name floor_name,p.type_name from orders o,employees e,photo_type p where o.type_id=p.type_id and o.floor=e.Employee_ID and o.order_id=${value}
select DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(o.date,'%m') from orders o where o.flag="是" and o.date like '${value}' ORDER BY o.date
select IFNULL(SUM(front_cost+o.second_cost),0) from orders o where o.flag="是" and o.date like '${value}'
